summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Dangara Hotel Management Admin Panel. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend UI and role-based access control functioning correctly. Minor chart rendering warnings detected but not affecting functionality.

design_issues.issue: Chart width/height warnings in console - charts display correctly but show console warnings about container dimensions
Missing Description warnings for DialogContent components

passed_tests: Role-based access control (admin vs receptionist permissions)
Dashboard metrics display and data loading
Rooms CRUD operations (admin only for create/edit/delete)
Room filtering by status (Available, Occupied, Reserved, Cleaning)
Guest management (create, search, edit, view history)
Reports functionality (daily, monthly, yearly revenue charts)
Currency formatting in UZS format with proper spacing
Responsive UI elements and proper styling
